Mercedes-Benz CLS-Class 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Mercedes-Benz CLS-Class 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Mercedes-Benz CLS-Class changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Mercedes-Benz CLS-Class 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

0-60 2012 MB CLS 550

 

Mercedes-Benz CLS550 0-60 acceleration 0-100 km/h

I timed it at 5.7sec, and I think it could shave a few 10's of a second (MB states 5.4sec to 100km/h).
As you can see the traction control worked a bit (the asphalt was quite poor).
Car has a 5.5L V8 with 382BHP. 4020lbs.
